message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SD, cs.CY, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper addresses privacy and security concerns related to smart speakers, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The paper discusses the user experience and control over data leaving their living room, which is a key aspect of human-computer interaction.
- cs.SD (Software Engineering): The paper introduces an open-source software solution for privacy and security concerns related to smart speakers, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper addresses privacy concerns related to for-profit organizations collecting and storing user data, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper introduces a new software solution for privacy and security concerns related to smart speakers, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
